meanings.definition: A loose collarless shirt worn in South Asia.
meanings.sent1: She bought a new kurta for the traditional celebration.
meanings.sent2: In South Asia, many people wear a kurta as part of their cultural attire.
meanings.sent3: The kurta and jeans combo made him look like a fusion fashion guru.
meanings.sent4: Her kurta was a colorful canvas that brightened up the room.
meanings.sent5: The soft fabric of the kurta draped elegantly around her.
